Galloway: s campaign finance reports show no contributions from groups who openly support defunding the police.
One organization cited by Uniting Missou: Indivisible, favors defunding and has been encouraging people to donate to her campaign. However, the group has not actually made a donation.
Uniting Missouri: a political action committee in support of Gov. Mike Parson’s bid for reelection, has been running attack ads against Nicole Galloway, connecting her to groups that want to defund the police.
After thoroughly examining Galloway: s campaign finance reports, no contributions were found from any group that expressly and openly supports defunding the police. Most of the donations were from individuals and labor unions.
